name: Hospital and Polyclinics Registration Reports
query:
SELECT 
    name AS "HPRNo.",
    polyclinic_name AS "Polyclinic Name",
    category AS "Category",
    area AS "Area",
    telephone AS "Hospital Telephone",
    contact_name AS "Contact Person",
    contact_telephone AS "Contact Mobile",
    registered_by AS "Registered By",
    date
FROM  
    `tabHospital and Polyclinics Registration`
WHERE 
    date BETWEEN %(from)s AND %(to)s
